settings.title: Sanitation Practices
settings.text:
A. Every client will receive fresh clean glassware, towels, and linen.

B. Every client before being serviced must thoroughly wash their hands

C. Frequently touched areas are routinely sanitized

D. There are UV purifiers in the room to help filter out bacteria and germs

E. New gloves are used for every client

G.Â  All tools and implements used are thoroughly sanitized and disinfected

settings.title: Studio Guidelines
settings.text:
A. Arrive on time for your appointment so that the standard of relaxation is met

B. Upon arrival, inform us that you are here, and someone will come and meet you

C. Please be mindful if coming from the gym and then receiving a service. With all of our services the esthetician will be in close proximity to you.

D. If you are local and just want to purchase retail, make sure to book the appointment in advance.

E. No extra guests or children unless being serviced are allowed at your appointment time.

settings.title: Booking and Cancellation Policies
settings.text:
A. Deposits must be paid at the time of booking the appointment

B. Cancellations must be made 24hrs before your scheduled appointment time, failure to do so will result in the loss of your deposit.

C. All no calls/no shows will be charged the full cost of the treatment

D. Full payment of the service will be required in order to book for repeated no call/no shows(3).

E. Arrival 10 minutes after your scheduled wax appointment and 15 minutes after a facial/body service will result in the loss of your deposit, and the appointment will have to be rescheduled.

settings.small_footnote: At SilkPar Aesthetics we respect and value the time of our clients and we ask for the same in return. When arriving late to your appointment it affects the guests that are scheduled right after you. Our booking and cancellation policies are in place to protect each and every guest as well as the business. We thank you for adhering to the policies we put in place, and for choosing us to do business with.
